api_list.name: Generar Fhir ID QR
api_list.description: Recibe el id de fhir como string y lo convierte en codigo qr
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://selector-tipo-consultas.p.rapidapi.com/fhir_id_qr_code/a554c619-bc73-4080-9cc9-74da38789d48"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "selector-tipo-consultas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://selector-tipo-consultas.p.rapidapi.com/fhir_id_qr_code/{fhir_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "selector-tipo-consultas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
